nodes.text: Amden vor Keiodian was a male who served as a corporal in the Republic Army during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, Keioidian was assigned to Sergeant Shanra Immel's squad and served with SpecForce Colonel Jace Malcom during a battle on Kalandis Seven, a desolate Inner Rim planet. During the course of the battle, Keioidian and the squad were tasked with the destruction of local Imperial controlled spaceport. On the way to the spaceport, Keioidian and the squad were attacked and he was wounded. Keioidian's sergeant activated his med tracer before ordering the squad to move out, leaving Keioidian behind dying from his wounds.

Amden vor Keioidian first appeared in Alexander Freed's short story The Last Battle of Colonel Jace Malcom which was published within Star Wars Insider 137 and released on October 23, 2012. Keioidian's species was not identified in the short story. While Keioidian is presented as a dying man in the short story his death is never shown, leaving it ambiguous as to whether he died.
